alt: Technical facilities at Surrey aim to give students a taste of the workplace.
article_heading: Ones to watch: three rising stars of this year’s university guide
description: The image depicts a group of individuals, presumably scientists or laboratory technicians, gathered around a workbench. They are all wearing white lab coats, which are standard attire for individuals working in a scientific or laboratory setting. The lab coats are typically worn to protect clothing from spills and stains that can occur during experiments.  The individuals are engaged in what appears to be a collaborative activity, possibly conducting an experiment or discussing a project. Some of them are wearing protective eyewear, which is common in laboratories to shield the eyes from splashes or particles that could cause injury.  The workbench is equipped with various scientific instruments and equipment, suggesting that the setting is a laboratory. There are beakers, test tubes, and other containers that are commonly used in chemical or biological experiments. The presence of these items indicates that the group is likely involved in some form of scientific research or analysis.  The individuals are standing close to each other, which suggests a sense of camaraderie or teamwork. Their expressions and body language convey a sense of focus and engagement, which is typical of individuals working in a professional scientific environment.  Overall, the image captures a moment of scientific collaboration and discovery, with the individuals actively participating in their work.

alt: … Prof Max Lu, vice-chancellor at the University of Surrey.

alt: A protester dressed as bishop in a night-time march
article_heading: Religious groups ‘spending billions to counter gender-equality education’
description: The image depicts a nighttime scene with a crowd of people gathered on a street. The central figure is a man dressed in traditional religious attire, specifically that of a Catholic priest. He is wearing a red robe with gold trim, a white cassock, and a tall, pointed hat with a golden band and a cross on the front. The priest is looking directly at the camera with a serious expression.  The crowd consists of individuals of various ages and attire, some of whom are holding signs or banners, suggesting that this might be a protest or demonstration. The setting appears to be an urban environment with streetlights illuminating the scene. In the background, there is a building with a dome and a flagpole, which could be a government building or a church. The overall atmosphere is solemn and the lighting suggests it is either dusk or nighttime.
